item.description:
Howdy! If you are looking for a different way to spend your Saturday evening come on out to the Midnight Rodeo Bar. So.....you've never had the chance to line dance? Come take Michelle's fun, easy lessons at 7:30.    Jandee Lee Porter will be performing for the first time on Saturday nite.  Lets show your support and welcome them! If you are looking to meet new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there for a boot scoot'in good time! 
$10.00 cover charge
21 +

 

  October 8 will be sports paraphernalia nite...wear your favorite sport team jersey, hat...anything goes folks!  Join in the fun.  

October 22 is the line and partner workshop.  Don't miss this opportunity to learn to line dance so you can join the fun on Saturday nites at MRB!  

Congratulations to John Alicata for winning a free pass to MRB Saturday nite dance for 1 year!
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign on a table to the right of the room before the bar
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
